name: RE:RAT
description:
Re: RAT is a 2D adventure platformer games. the player can control a rat, name Maze. Maze wants to
rescue his parents that catch by the boss, ‘Cat’. Player has to find the way to the boss room before
catching by the cat that patrolling.
The purpose of the player is to find the road to the boss room, fight and kill the boss, then rescue the
character’s parents.
